Players: 2 to 4: Playing time: 15 to 30 minutes

遊人二亦三亦四: 手片如机戦。手値如終季！
Players: 2 to 4: Capture pieces just like Cetkaik! Earn scores just like Tashot!
Your job is to hire government officials and seek to form a good government.

遊人二亦三亦四: 急於全人而硬於全人即為生友連！
Players: 2 to 4: Be the first to form the strongest alliances!
How the game goes

遊人二亦三亦四: 始手片斥片而行衣上之片而手片。
Players: 2 to 4: Discard a piece, move a piece on the board, and obtain a piece.

遊人二亦三亦四: 再々為此而手集心受之片。
Players: 2 to 4: Repeat this to collect the pieces that you want.

遊人二亦三亦四: 於手片善之友連在即開此而能手値。
Players: 2 to 4: When you have an appropriate combination of pieces in your hand, reveal it and earn some score.
Organize your hand quickly and aim for a high score!
Content
This leaflet
Banknotes (一銭: 1pt, 三銭: 3pts, 十銭: 10pts, 12 each)
Cloth board
Five dice-sticks

遊人二亦三亦四: 片（二色。皇色兵片加白色筆片。全六十八片）
Players: 2 to 4: Pieces (Two colors. Green: Site Workers, White: Administrative Officers. 68 pieces in total)
Jokers
Setup for the game

遊人二亦三亦四: 目人之多少而定片之多少。
Players: 2 to 4: Based on the number of players, adjust the number of pieces as follows.
4 people: use all pieces
3 people: remove all 0s.
2 people: remove all 0s and two jokers.

遊人二亦三亦四: 付衣於全人手軸能行之処。(p)
Players: 2 to 4: Place the cloth board within reach of all players. (A)

遊人二亦三亦四: 遊人定赤青黒硫之一而労於汝色之衣端。(b)
Players: 2 to 4: Each player chooses one of the four colors: red, blue, black, or yellow, and sits at the corresponding edge of the board. (B)
Setup for each Season
Mix all the pieces face down. Give nine pieces to each player.

遊人二亦三亦四: 汝立汝之手片而別人無能目汝之手片。(m)
Players: 2 to 4: Be sure to make the pieces stand so that other players cannot peek at yours. (C)

遊人二亦三亦四: 手残片之内二十四片付開於衣。
Players: 2 to 4: Take twenty-four of the remaining pieces and place them face up on the cloth board.
There shall be no pieces on the central square (the Mountain).
The remaining pieces are kept face down. (D)
Determine the starting player and play order.

遊人二亦三亦四: 於此時目豊貧而貧於全人即其人此軸人。
Players: 2 to 4: The player with the fewest points becomes the starting player.

遊人二亦三亦四: 目軸人右左而貧人端生遊術周行之道。
Players: 2 to 4: The game proceeds clockwise or counterclockwise, depending on which of the two players next to the starting player has the fewer points.

遊人二亦三亦四: 其人多之時其季生遊術一位之時撃裁而定軸人加周行(x)
Players: 2 to 4: When there are multiple players satisfying the condition, or when it is the first round, throw the dice-sticks to determine the starting player and the direction of play. (E)
Season
In each Season, players take turn and spend Days.

遊人二亦三亦四: 於或人言「国官集来！」之時裁値而季終而新季始来。
Players: 2 to 4: The Season ends when a player declares “Lauzait-Cep”. Scores are calculated and the new Season starts.

遊人二亦三亦四: 為終遊人多少之季亦全人満心之時遊終。
Players: 2 to 4: The game ends after the same number of rounds as there are players, or when all players are satisfied and decide to end the game.
Day

遊人二亦三亦四: 遊人於日行々為下之労件。
Players: 2 to 4: On each Day, players perform the following actions in order.

遊人二亦三亦四: 無亦一時 斥値而手其時開之友連再閉。（心古行新）
Players: 2 to 4: [none/once] Dissolving a Department: you return points and reconceal the set that you have previously revealed at that time.

遊人二亦三亦四: 無亦一時 開手片之一友連而手値。（与労）
Players: 2 to 4: [none/once] Forming a Department: you reveal some pieces in your hand that can form a set, and obtain some score.

遊人二亦三亦四: 一時 始手片斥一片而行衣上之片而手片。（引人）
Players: 2 to 4: [once] Hiring: you discard a piece, move another piece on the board, and obtain a piece.

遊人二亦三亦四: 無亦一時 手集来値終季。（国官集来）
Players: 2 to 4: [none/once] Lauzait-Cep!: you gain the formation score and finish the Season.
Note that Hiring is mandatory.
Hiring (mandatory)

遊人二亦三亦四: 始手片斥一片而行衣上之片而手片。
Players: 2 to 4: You discard a piece, move another piece on the board, and obtain a piece.
Discard a piece in your hand onto the empty square,

遊人二亦三亦四: 能行之片生斥片之同色而大一位亦小一位之片。
Players: 2 to 4: then choose  a piece of the same color and adjacent number (±1) and move to one of the eight surrounding squares.

遊人二亦三亦四: 勿生来斥片而片無能行之時。
Players: 2 to 4: You cannot discard a piece with no corresponding piece on the board, as it would be impossible to move any piece in such a situation.

遊人二亦三亦四: 行入之処之片普時手此。
Players: 2 to 4: The piece you obtain is typically the one occupying your move’s destination.
When moving from the Mountain

遊人二亦三亦四: 皇山此皇色之囲。在山之片享皇之神力而能行於多多囲。
Players: 2 to 4: “Tam’s Mountain” is the green square. The piece on the mountain receives Tam’s mystical power and can go to a larger number of squares.
The move is as shown below, resembling the Lanermic character for “Tam” (皇).
You can ignore the intervening piece.
When entering the water

遊人二亦三亦四: 皇水此水色之囲。入於水此極硬。
Players: 2 to 4: “Tam’s Water” is the blue square. It is very difficult to enter the water.

遊人二亦三亦四: 汝行片而心手皇水之片之時汝須撃裁。
Players: 2 to 4: When you move the piece and try to obtain a piece in the water square, you need to throw the dice-sticks.

遊人二亦三亦四: 裁無亦一亦二即汝手汝行之片。
Players: 2 to 4: When it is zero, one or two, you obtain the piece that tried to move.

遊人二亦三亦四: 三亦四亦五即汝手行処皇水之片。
Players: 2 to 4: When three, four or five, you obtain the piece that is in the water square you are moving to.
Jokers

遊人二亦三亦四: 汝使歪片能為別片之労。
Players: 2 to 4: You can use a joker to serve as the role of another piece.

遊人二亦三亦四: 此故始手片斥歪片之時汝能行衣上之或色或位之片。
Players: 2 to 4: Thus, when you discard a joker, you can move an arbitrary piece on the board.

遊人二亦三亦四: 逆道衣上歪片此斥或色或位而能行此。
Players: 2 to 4: Oppositely, when there is a joker on the board, you can discard a piece of any color and number in order to be qualified to move the joker.

遊人二亦三亦四: 与労（全多一時）（無為此善）
Players: 2 to 4: Forming a Department (optional)

遊人二亦三亦四: 於手片三片之友連在即能為此労。
Players: 2 to 4: When three pieces in your hand can form a three-of-a-kind or a sequence-of-three, you can perform this action.
You reveal the Department and earn the bonus score.

遊人二亦三亦四: 開片此手片別而無能斥。為心古行新之労即唯再斥。
Players: 2 to 4: The revealed pieces remain in your hand, but they cannot be discarded. The only way to discard them is to dissolve the Department.
Three-of-a-kind
Three pieces with the same color and the same number
Sequence-of-three
Three pieces with the same color and the consecutive numbers.
The numbers do not wrap around.
Bonus score

遊人二亦三亦四: 目友連全大之片而手加値。
Players: 2 to 4: Find the piece with the largest number on it and earn the bonus score based on that number.
The bonus score is the number of dots on the piece.

遊人二亦三亦四: 使歪片於全大之片之時手無真之値之加値。
Players: 2 to 4: When a joker is used to represent the largest number in the set, the obtained bonus score is calculated based on the number that the joker represents.
A three-of-a-kind triples the bonus score.

遊人二亦三亦四: 歪片在於友連即裁加値而歪片一片在而手下一値。
Players: 2 to 4: Each joker in a set decreases the bonus score by one.
The bonus score is always nonnegative.
Examples
5 is the largest.
5 gives two points; the bonus score is two.
Joker is the largest; it serves as a 3.

遊人二亦三亦四: 三生一値即三友三層此故三値。
Players: 2 to 4: 3 gives one point. Since this is a three-of-a-kind, the bonus score is tripled, resulting in three points.

遊人二亦三亦四: 一片歪片在即加値二値。
Players: 2 to 4: Since there is a single joker, the bonus score is reduced to two points.
Lauzait-Cep!

遊人二亦三亦四: 或時開三友連之時其人言「国官集来！」而再受集来値。
Players: 2 to 4: When revealing three Departments, the player can declare “Lauzait-Cep!” (meaning “A government is formed!”) and receive the formation score.

遊人二亦三亦四: 妙時開片無而三友連在手片之時同言「国官集来！」而受集来値。
Players: 2 to 4: As an exception, if you have not revealed any pieces and have three valid combinations in your hand, you can declare “Lauzait-Cep!” to gain the formation score.

遊人二亦三亦四: 此時無能手開片加値唯手集来値。
Players: 2 to 4: In such a situation, you only earn the formation score, and cannot earn the bonus score that would have been obtainable by revealing the sets (one by one).
The list of all the formation scores
Lauzait-Cep (pronounced LOUD-site SEP)
Specialized Experts
All the pieces have the same color
Great Sequence
nine consecutive numbers
Layered Bridges

遊人二亦三亦四: 於手片同値之二友連在
Players: 2 to 4: Two sets whose numbers exactly match.
Does not have to be the same color. It can either be a three-of-a-kind or a sequence-of-three.
Well-Balanced

遊人二亦三亦四: 筆之積値加兵之積値同
Players: 2 to 4: The sum of the numbers on the white pieces (Administrative Officers) matches that of the green pieces (Site Workers).
Jokers are ignored.
Stalemate
When no action can be taken.

遊人二亦三亦四: 引人之時能斥之片此無在。反行上時而為心古行新即同為術無之時唯目此
Players: 2 to 4: A situation in which there is no piece to discard during the hiring phase. It is considered a stalemate only if dissolving a Department earlier was not an option to avoid this outcome.

遊人二亦三亦四: 闇戦之集此妙時。其時無目手片友連而言「国官集来！」
Players: 2 to 4: Stalemate is a special situation in which, regardless of the combination of pieces in your hand, you declare “Lauzait-Cep!”

遊人二亦三亦四: 言「国官集来！」即裁値而季終。
Players: 2 to 4: When “Lauzait-Cep!” is declared, the scores are calculated and the Season ends.

遊人二亦三亦四: 其季無遊術全下即始「季之上裁」始季。
Players: 2 to 4: When the Season is not the final one, the setup for the next Season is performed and the new Season begins.

遊人二亦三亦四: 心古行新（全多一時）（無為此善）
Players: 2 to 4: Dissolving a Department (at most once) (optional)

遊人二亦三亦四: 妙時圧眉古時与労而手加値。
Players: 2 to 4: Sometimes, you regret what you have done in the past to obtain the score.

遊人二亦三亦四: 其時汝識心古行新之術。
Players: 2 to 4: In such cases, you can dissolve a Department.

遊人二亦三亦四: 為此之時手其時開之一友連再閉而反与開時手之加値。
Players: 2 to 4: To perform this action, you reconceal the set that you have previously revealed, and refund the bonus score that you have obtained at that time.
The refund must be done correctly.

遊人二亦三亦四: 無正如此。開「二三歪」手二値而下時汝心古行新「歪二三」反与一値。
Players: 2 to 4: An example of an incorrect refund is when you form a Department as “2-3-Joker” and obtain two points but you dissolve it as “Joker-2-3” and refund one point.
Benefit fraud must be heavily prosecuted.
End of the game

遊人二亦三亦四: 為終遊人多少之季亦全人満心之時遊終。
Players: 2 to 4: The game ends after the same number of rounds as there are players, or when all players are satisfied and decide to end the game.
The player with the highest score at that time wins.

遊人二亦三亦四: 全豊人多之時其之全人上行。
Players: 2 to 4: When there are multiple players with the highest score, they all win.
Additional rules

遊人二亦三亦四: 学深即加行下律此同善噫。
Players: 2 to 4: Once you get used to the game, you can add the following rules.

遊人二亦三亦四: 上裁之下時開残片之一為此同光片。
Players: 2 to 4: After the setup, reveal one of the remaining unused pieces and designate it as the luminous piece.

遊人二亦三亦四: 光片於手片在之時言「国官集来！」即一片此一値。
Players: 2 to 4: Each luminous piece in your hand awards you an additional point when you declare “Lauzait-Cep!”
